short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Links and information about Paleochora at your fingertips!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Paleochora Site extension is a handy way to keep up to date with Paleochora. 

Simply click the icon and you see the mobile version of The Paleochora Site pop into your Chrome browser! - All the handy links you need at your fingertips...including transport, weather, accommodation, general information as well as a link to the Facebook page.

You will also get automatic notifications when there is a new "Explore!" post published as well as other Paleochora Site news.

You can install the extension to your Chrome browser with just a click right now.
